description.@en: Dwarves are stern and taciturn, unyielding to manipulation. Born with an innate ability to see through Magickal deception and trickery, their mind is unyielding. Changing their perception is incredibly difficult, as they are stubborn in belief and pragmatic in nature.

effect.@en: You are immune to Magick which may control your mind and see through illusions without fail.
